plot outline: The film revolves around a Goan politician with a criminal background, Rangrao (Ajinkya Deo), who aspires to become the Chief Minister of Goa one day. It is only with the timely disclosure of his deeds by his honest security officer Siddharth (Bharat Jadhav) to the party president (Uday Sabnis), that he is on the verge of being exposed. Rangrao tries to blackmail the party president and sends his goons after his security officer, who flees with all the evidences. Before being shot by Rangrao's sharp shooter (Santosh Juvekar), Siddharth reveals to his wife (Sonali Kulkarni) the whole story of the crime and the place where he has hidden the evidences. Sonali realizing the danger from Rangrao and his henchmen, plays a cat and mouse game, bringing a twist into the film.
title: Ringa Ringa
plot: Rangrao who is all set to become the Goa Chief Minister in spite of his nexus with terrorists. But, his security chief spills the beans of Rangrao to the Party chief. He is assigned the task of getting the evidence against Rangrao.

The film revolves around a Goan politician with a criminal background, Rangrao (Ajinkya Deo), who aspires to become the Chief Minister of Goa one day. It is only with the timely disclosure of his deeds by his honest security officer Siddharth (Bharat Jadhav) to the party president (Uday Sabnis), that he is on the verge of being exposed. Rangrao tries to blackmail the party president and sends his goons after his security officer, who flees with all the evidences. Before being shot by Rangrao's sharp shooter (Santosh Juvekar), Siddharth reveals to his wife (Sonali Kulkarni) the whole story of the crime and the place where he has hidden the evidences. Sonali realizing the danger from Rangrao and his henchmen, plays a cat and mouse game, bringing a twist into the film.

Rangarao is soon to become the Chief Minister of Goa but his trusted security guy Siddanth meet his part chief Appasaheb Marathe and reports about his connection with terrorists.Appasaheb asks Rangarao to gather evidence in order to expose him.Siddanth gathers the evidence but Rangarao sends his sharp shooter Jhonny behind him but before dying Siddanth gives the details to his wife Mansi where he has hidden the evidence.Vishwas common friend of Siddanth and Mansi who also develops liking towards her and Jhonny are given the task by Rangaro to keep watch on her in order to get the evidence.But after Siddanth's death Mansi looses her mental balance and feels that he is still alive.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
